Posts.Content: Hello Muneera, I hope you’re doing fine, what did the doctor say about the treatment? Are you going to need any treatment?
Posts.Title: Needing God's strength!

Posts.Content: Hello Muneera, sorry you’re going through this at this young age. Waiting for the test result can be a nerve wracking, keep us posted and I wish you best of luck.
Posts.Title: Needing God's strength!

Posts.Content: Hello, if you are in pain, you need to get that checked, go for a second opinion, or see a specialist. Good luck and let us know how that goes.
Posts.Title: confused

Posts.Content: Sorry to hear this is happing to you and that your doctor doesn’t believe you, I don’t know anyone who has symptoms similar like yours, but have you heard of Chronic radiation syndrome, it’s an effect that happens after months or years of exposure to radiation, I’m not sure if this is what you have, but you could look for a second opinion. Waiting to hear from you and good luck Rainy.
Posts.Title: Liver damage after having radiation for breast cancer

Posts.Content: Yes! Absolutely go for a second opinion, if that makes you feel better go for it. And I hope the results come back as nothing serious, good luck.
Posts.Title: Would have turned into cancer
